content: **note pattern includes instructions for both the plain and striped versions ** this is the perfect little project for learning to knit sizing baby child youth adult m adult l to fit approximately 17 19 5 21 22 5 24 or 43 25 49 5 53 25 57 61 cm head circumference **materials ** yarn for plain hat approximately 50 50 100 100 100 grams and bulky weight yarn that will knit to gauge yarn for striped hat approximately 50 50 100 100 100 grams total of colour 1 c1 and colour 2 c2 in bulky weight yarn that will knit to gauge needles 6mm 16 40 cm circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker darning needle crochet hook to attach tassels spare 6mm needle if you choose to do the 3-needle bind-off gauge 3 5 sts = 1 14 sts & 21 row = 4 10cm in stockinette stitch skills utilized knitting and purling in the round three-needle bind-off or kitchener stitch to close top of hat pattern includes instructions for both methods all sizes have not yet been test knit please let me know if you have any questions
